title: Polly and Mark Addison Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarships for one or more incoming freshman students enrolled at CU Boulder who have attended high school in a rural school district, have shown an interest in or a talent for visual art, and demonstrate financial need.
marketingContent: To provide scholarships for Art & Art History undergrads who show an interest or talent for the visual arts, demonstrate financial need, and from under-served rural and inner-city Colorado high schools that historically send few students to CU Boulder.
